column4: ok guys... I got Ubuntu 7.10, and i'm trying to install it into parallels. and it absolutely always crashes when trying to start the X server since it starts with this crazy resolution.
even if I select my screen resolution manually on boot, the liveCD goes to like 2500xsomething.
I only have one in the package sent.
I ordered those CDs from canonical because, exactly, I can't really practically download the thing.
weird sat uplink with a very low down limit.
but it's the only thing available where I am.
down? rather fast, we're talking about 7mbps.
but can'T chug more than 2 gb in a month.
you RULE (I still don't understand why I didn't go on the parallels site...)
